activities: We use this Personal Information when conducting human resources functions and activities, including (1) personnel administration and organizational planning, including budgeting and staffing; (2) internal job postings; (3) training and personal development; (4) career planning (i.e., review of performances, goal settings, advancements, appraisals and incentives); (5) internal mobility and international assignments; (6) employee evaluations and skills management (i.e., talent management); (7) disciplinary actions; (8) management of an employee directory and company chart; (9) professional email services; (10) employee travel administration and expense reimbursement; (11) employee support services (e.g., computers, telephones, Blackberry, car fleet); (12) administration of Scotts information systems; (13) administration of compensation, incentives programs and benefits; (14) occupational health and safety; (15) security and environmental management; (16) compliance with applicable laws and judicial or administrative orders; and (17) internal investigations and audits.
corpofftitle1: Executive Vice President & General Counsel, Corporate Secretary
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, France, Germany, Poland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Human resources data, including manually processed data
recoursemech: The relevant data protection authorities (EU DPAs).
